content:
HTML: HyperText Markup Language; HTML5 newer & modified functions
XML - eXtensible Markup Language
JSON - JavaScript Object Notation

Velocity, volume, & variety

A code can be seen by the Client but a server can't see the code -- the data is only for display on the browser.

<script type="text/javascript">
      var input = window.prompt("Enter your name");
           document.write(input)
</script>

<a href="www.link.com">Link Name</a>
<img scr="name.png" alt="hover name" width="#" height="#">

external css:   <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles.css">
internal: <style> in head, location {color: colorname;} || ie: h1   {color: blue;}

Math.floor(Math.random() *10) returns numbers between 1 and 9. Rounds down.
Math.ceiling(Math.random() *10) will return 1 thru 10. Rounds up.
